name: V_EHI_TRG_FILTER
description: This view is used to find the treatment plan associated with a treatment day, as well as whether the treatment day was deleted.

columns.name: IS_TRG_DELETED_YN
columns.description: A yes/no flag indicating whether this treatment day has been deleted or not.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient who is associated with this treatment plan or pathway.
